html:
** Shares in Airtel Africa AAF.L rise 2.5% to 81.30p

** Global payment processor Mastercard Inc MA.N will invest $100 mln in Airtel Africa's mobile money operations, Airtel Mobile Commerce BV (AMC BV), valuing the business at $2.65 bln, the London-listed company says (Full Story)

** Mastercard will hold a minority stake in AMC BV, in line with Airtel Africa's plan to monetise the mobile money business by selling up to a 25% stake in the unit

** AAF set for biggest intraday percentage gain since March 18


(Reporting by Shanima A in Bengaluru)
